PageWidgetPortable.Title: Comprados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PR_ESTRUTURASPRODUTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PRODUTOPAI = @CAMPO(HANDLE) AND A.PRODUTO IN ( SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PD_PRODUTOS B WHERE B.HANDLE = A.PRODUTO AND B.TIPO IN (1,2,3,4,5,6) AND DATAFINAL >= GETDATE() ) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/Producao/EstruturasProduto.form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
